EmailTemplate.name: Must Sign New Benefit Summary in MBO System before we can activate the account (
EmailTemplate.subject: Must Sign New Benefit Summary in MBO System before we can activate the account (1383237778.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Evan, Since we made changes to your benefits you need to electronically sign a new benefits summary. To complete please follow these steps: · Log in to MBO System· Click on “Personal Info” (top menu bar)· Click on “Benefits” (left menu bar)· Go to bottom of page and click on “sign new summary” Please let me know when you are done. Thank you!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
